external_references.description: Meltzer, M. et al. (2024, January 10). Active Exploitation of Two Zero-Day Vulnerabilities in Ivanti Connect Secure VPN. Retrieved February 27, 2024.

description: During [Cutting Edge](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0029), threat actors used Task Manager to dump LSASS memory from Windows devices to disk.(Citation: Volexity Ivanti Zero-Day Exploitation January 2024)
